basics.name: Vishal
basics.label: Data Analytics & Machine Learning Practitioner
basics.summary: Aspiring Data Analytics and Machine Learning Practitioner with a strong passion for continuous learning and innovation[cite: 4]. Skilled in Python, Data Analysis, and machine learning techniques[cite: 5]. Currently enhancing knowledge of RAG and eager to contribute to innovative use cases in NLP and GenAI applications[cite: 8].

work.name: BlackCoffer, New Delhi, INDIA
work.summary: Extracted and pre-processed unstructured text data from the company's website using Python libraries (BeautifulSoup, Pandas, Scikit-learn)[cite: 20]. Performed in-depth NLP analysis, including sentiment analysis, readability analysis, and keyword identification[cite: 21].
highlights: Built a Machine learning model using Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) to identify key themes, improving the content organization by 15%[cite: 22].
Provided actionable insights that led to more targeted and effective communication strategies[cite: 23].

education.institution: Humber College North Campus, ON, CA
education.summary: Learned to make informed decisions based on Data Analysis and provide data driven solutions to support business strategy[cite: 26]. Experience in building Machine learning models including Deep learning models[cite: 27].
courses: Hands-On Experience with AWS Cloud Services (EC2, Lambda Functions, SageMaker, GuardRail, CloudWatch) [cite: 28]
Projects: Uber Taxi Analysis, Twitter Post Sentimental Analysis [cite: 26]

education.institution: University of Delhi, New Delhi, INDIA
education.summary: Core studies in Software Engineering, Data Structure and Algorithms, and Traditional Machine Learning[cite: 30]. Member of Computer Society of College (ACE), Organizing Seasonal and Annual Tech Events[cite: 31].
courses: Programming Languages: Python, R, SQL, JavaScript, C++ [cite: 30]
Mathematics: Linear Algebra, Calculus and Probability and Statistics [cite: 30]

certificates.name: Advance Python and SQL for Data Science

projects.name: Humber College - Information Technology Service (ITS)
projects.summary: Led a five-member team to develop a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) based chatbot to automate curriculum design research[cite: 12]. Enhanced the retrieval system's effectiveness using multi-stage re-ranking of retrieved content representation (DLM, TDILM, monoT5)[cite: 14].
highlights: Chatbot reduced faculty research and compile time for curriculum design from average 1 hours to 2 minutes with content accuracy of 95%[cite: 16].
Utilized Agile methodologies for weekly client meetings, requirements gathering, and feature demonstration[cite: 15].
Tools: Langchain, LlamaIndex, ChromaDB, OpenAI GPT-4, Streamlit, Git and Github, Python, ClickUp[cite: 18].
